title: Is it difficult to solve physics NCERT problems for the first time? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Yes and no If you are studying for JEE from any coaching or from anywhere then you will easily solve them, but if you are only studying for school examinations then you will face problems while solving NCERT problems especially additional exercises
Not difficult. You may look at some solved examples. Difficult. If you are unaware of that chapter of the subject.
